nodes.text: Arak Omis was the Taal of the Aramandi during the Galactic Civil War. Pushy and argumentative, Omis was a former member of the Cirra akia. He was praised for his ability to resolve inter-akia disputes. Omis sought to keep the Aramandi out of the affairs of otherworlders, and constantly rebuffed the advances of Lant Mining Corporation to open up mining ventures in the Aramand Cluster.
